first_translate: the knights from  house ernest have arrived.
I wonder what’s going on...
it looks like they’re in quite a hurry.
haha.

hangle: 저는 무슨 일인지 알 것도 같습니다.
first_translate: but I think I know why that is.

hangle: 영애에게 지지 않기 위해 큰 한 방이라도 노리는 거겠지요.
first_translate: marquess clovis must want to deal them a decisive blow so he doesn’t lose against lady fiona.
lady fiona.

hangle: 영애께서도 자리를 이동해서 마저 사냥을 하실 건가요?
first_translate: will you also move somewhere else to continue hunting?
no.
my stamina has been depleted, so I’m taking a short break.
is that right...?

hangle: 피오나 영애는 헤일론에서 오랫동안 마물을 상대했죠.
first_translate: lady fiona fought monsters for a long time while she was at hylon castle.

hangle: 개인적으로 마물에 관해 영애의 의견을 듣고 싶습니다만.
first_translate: if possible, could you tell me your thoughts about these creatures?

hangle: 제가 답변해 드릴 수 있는 거라면요.
first_translate: of course, if there's anything I can answer.

hangle: 영애는 혹시 ‘어둠’에 대해 들어본 적 있습니까?
first_translate: do you happen to know anything about “the darkness”?
that question wasn’t unexpected.

hangle: 아렌트가 말한 ‘어둠’은, 통상적인 의미로 쓰이는 단어가 아니다.
first_translate: when arendt says "darkness," he isn't using the term as we normally would.
yes, I’ve heard of it before.

hangle: 작중 피오나가 최종 보스가 된 가장 큰 이유가 이 ‘어둠’을 다루려고 하다가 실패한 거니까.
first_translate: fiona became the final boss because she tried but failed to control this very thing called “the darkness.”
darkness does not take any particular form.

hangle: 보통 전조도 없이 등장하기에 피할 방법도 없다.
first_translate: and since no signs appear beforehand, one cannot avoid it either.

hangle: 다만 그것이 나타나면 땅은 메말랐고, 주변 마물은 흉포해졌다.
first_translate: all we do know is that when it appears, the ground dries up and nearby monsters become more aggressive.

hangle: 어둠이란 현상이 나타난 지역의 마물은 더욱 광폭하고 강해진다고 하죠.
first_translate: as you said, once the phenomenon known as darkness occurs, all the monsters within its vicinity grow stronger and even more violent.
you’re correct.

hangle: ‘어둠’이란 단어자체는 아카데미 학자들이 처음 그 현상을 파악했을 때 명명됐지만…
first_translate: scholars named this phenomenon “darkness” after first discovering it,

hangle: 학자들도 어둠에 대한 건 어느 것 하나 확언을 못하죠.
first_translate: but none of them were able to say much about it.
this is because nobody who directly witnessed the darkness...
...has survived.
yes, that’s right.
so you already knew about it.

hangle: 보통 어둠과 닿은 사람은 모두가 죽었다.
first_translate: normally, anyone who comes into contact with the darkness dies.

hangle: 그 현상을 직접 목격한 자가 한 명도 없으니, 자연히 정보의 양 자체가 매우 적다.
first_translate: since nobody has ever seen it firsthand, naturally, information regarding it is scarce.
however, only one person...
...survived despite coming face-to-face with the darkness.

hangle: 바로 눈 앞에 있는 아렌트 클로비스.
first_translate: that man happens to be standing right here in front of us now.

hangle: 어릴 적, 그는 어둠이 나타난 순간을 목격하고도 살아남았다.
first_translate: in his childhood, arendt saw the moment the darkness appeared and lived through it.
although he suffered severe side effects afterward,

hangle: 어둠에 의한 후유증을 최대한 늦춰 주는
first_translate: to slow down those side effects caused by the darkness,

hangle: 가공한 마석을 늘 지니고 다니게 되었지만.
first_translate: he always carries around magic stones which have been processed.

hangle: 그렇게 유예 시간을 얻은 그는 자신의 몸을 침식하는 후유증과,
first_translate: with some extra time gained thanks to the stones, he is trying to find ways to eliminate both the aftermath affecting his body...

hangle: 그 ‘어둠’이란 존재를 없앨 방법을 찾고 있다.
first_translate: ...and the existence of the darkness itself.

hangle: …이건 아렌트가 유니스를 좋아하게 되면서 털어 놓는 이야기니
first_translate: unfortunately, arendt told eunice everything after falling in love with her,
which means I won’t be able to act like I know about this yet...
even back in hylon, people were concerned about the darkness.

hangle: 다만 어둠이 출현한 적은 없어 정보가 무척 적답니다.
first_translate: however, since it never occurred during my stay, there isn’t much information available.
I see.
right now, arendt has come up with one hypothesis.
these aren’t just ordinary gems...
they’re magic stones.

hangle: 마석은 그 자체로 어둠의 후유증을 지체시킨다.
first_translate: on their own, magic stones delay the side effects of the darkness.
at the same time, magic stones are affected by mana.
then perhaps a powerful magician...

hangle: 마력을 사용해 ‘어둠’을 조종할 수 있지 않을까.
first_translate: ...can use their powers to manipulate the darkness.

hangle: 그리고 그 가설을 시험할 조건에 부합하는 마법사가 바로…
first_translate: and the magician who meets the conditions needed to test out this theory...
...is fiona herself.

hangle: 물론 지금의 나로서는 아렌트를 도울 마음이 별로 없지만.
first_translate: of course, given how things stand currently, I don’t feel too inclined to help him.
hey.

hangle: 여기서 단 둘이 뭐 하는 거지?
first_translate: what are you two doing alone over here?
your highness.
we were resting for a bit.
I hear you made a bet with duke ernest...
how laid-back of you, lady fiona.

hangle: 아, 왜 농땡이 치냐고 묻고 있는 거지?
first_translate: wait, is he asking why I'm slacking off?

hangle: 전하께서도 이번 대회가 꽤나 지루하셨나 보네요.
first_translate: it seems like your highness finds today’s competition rather dull himself.

hangle: 마물을 담는 수레가 아직 넉넉해 보입니다.
first_translate: the carts used to carry the monsters still look pretty empty.
yeah, it really is boring.

hangle: 그러니 나도 둘의 휴식에 껴 주면 좋겠군.
first_translate: why don’t I join you two then?
what are you doing?!
oh dear, I’d be honored to rest together with your highness.
I suppose I’ll end my break now.
something feels off.
excuse me, please.
I wish you both good luck--
a horn sounded mid-competition...

hangle: 이건 사냥 대회를 끝낸다는 소리가 아닌가요?
first_translate: doesn’t that mean the hunt is ending early?
not exactly. we still need plenty of time until it ends.
but if it rang already,
that means something went wrong.
and probably not in a good way!
take a look, fiona.
other teams brought back these monsters.
though they seem like common low-level beasts,

hangle: 보시다시피 이빨이나 발톱도 원래보다 훨씬 크고 단단하지.
first_translate: as you can see, their teeth and claws are larger than usual and harder.
their leg muscles and skin are tougher as well.
normally, fire would work effectively against such creatures,

hangle: 이 정도로 겉이 단단하면 웬만한 불로는 소용도 없겠죠.
first_translate: but with bodies hardened to this extent, regular flames will hardly make a difference.

hangle: 솔직히 이렇게 변형될 이유는 하나밖에 없다.
first_translate: truthfully speaking, there’s only one reason why they'd change like this.

hangle: 너도 대충 짐작 하고 있는 것 같은데.
first_translate: I believe you might already suspect what that is.
the appearance...
...of the darkness.
there are injured men!
call for the physician immediately!
I saw dry land...
land that had turned black and died.

hangle: 통제선 너머에서 어둠으로 변형된 몹시 강한 마물들을 만났어.
first_translate: outside the boundary line, we encountered extremely strong monsters altered by the darkness.

hangle: 잠깐 싸운 것 만으로도 기사들이 수없이 목숨을 빼앗겼지…
first_translate: countless lives were lost among our ranks after fighting them briefly...
apparently, the darkness came and left again.

hangle: 어둠이 나타나는 순간을 맞닥뜨렸다면, 모조리 죽었을 거다.
first_translate: if we had faced it head-on, everyone would've perished.
evacuate the tents quickly!

hangle: 사냥터에 남아 있는 자가 없는지도 빠르게 확인하도록!
first_translate: make haste checking whether or not anybody remains inside the hunting grounds!
reporting in!

hangle: 피 냄새를 따라 남쪽 입구에 마물이 나타났습니다!
first_translate: monsters have appeared near the southern entrance following the scent of blood!

hangle: 비전투 인원은 당장 뒤로 빠지고, 싸울 수 있는 자는 무기를 들어라!
first_translate: non-combatants retreat immediately, and combatants prepare yourselves for battle!
yes, sir!!!
fiona, you shou--
I'll fight!

hangle: …이미 좀 지쳤으니 전투 보조로 빠지라고 말 하려 했다만.
first_translate: I wanted to suggest helping behind the lines instead since she’s tired already,
but that would be a waste of manpower!
let’s go search for someone who needs urgent assistance first.
afterward, we’ll proceed to the frontline.
I’ll return after tending to the wounded patients!
but lady eunice--!
eunice?
those poisoned require immediate treatment.
I shall treat them and leave with them later.

hangle: 치유의 힘을 가진 사람으로써 환자를 두고 갈 수는 없어요.
first_translate: as somebody gifted with healing abilities, I couldn’t possibly abandon these patients.
th-then we’ll get going...
e-eunice?!!
I’ll cure the poison straight away...!
